body_text:
Same issue I had with another function - we have fetchApprovalRequest and fetchApprovalRequests, which are nearly identical. Maybe it's just me, but I find functions with such similar names to be a little uncomfortable.
In general, I'm not sure if I'm totally on board with all of the separated request/requests logic. It's not super DRY, and in fact a little confusing, since the code is pretty much the same (except for a few s's).
Couldn't we just set up the actions to handle single requests just the same as multiple? I don't think I see the benefit to handling singular vs multiple responses differently.
